gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `TechnicalProvisionOther` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `TechnicalProvisionOther` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionOtherEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionOtherEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionOtherStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionOtherStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_TechnicalProvisionsOtherMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsOtherMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
